title: Starflower

|   | A mass of lashing vines and tentacles growing out of the husk of a dead star. Space itself runs through the xylem and phloem of its branches, which appear to be in many places at once. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Starflowers** are [Abyssal](/Abyss "Abyss") plants with dangerous reaching attacks. They can reach up to 3 tiles away, similar to the [Rift](/Rift "Rift") unrand.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                     |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Harpoon Shot](/Harpoon_Shot "Harpoon Shot") (2d16) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Like most stationary monsters, they aren't a threat if you stay outside of their range. However, they mostly appear in [vaults](/Vault "Vault"), often guarding the rune.

## History

- Starflowers were introduced in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").

Starflower

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.
starflower P 
HP 59-120
HD 16
XP 1057
Speed 10 (stationary)
AC 16
EV 0
Will 100
Attack1 22 (tentacle slap: rift)
Attack2 17 (tentacle slap: reach)
Attack3 13 (tentacle slap: distort)
Resistances rF+
rC+
rPois+
rAcid
rDrown
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Plant
Size Medium
Type plant, starflower
Flags Stationary
A mass of lashing vines and tentacles growing out of the husk of a dead star. Space itself runs through the xylem and phloem of its branches, which appear to be in many places at once.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Starflowers are Abyssal plants with dangerous reaching attacks. They can reach up to 3 tiles away, similar to the Rift unrand.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Harpoon Shot (2d16) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Like most stationary monsters, they aren't a threat if you stay outside of their range. However, they mostly appear in vaults, often guarding the rune.

History

  • Starflowers were introduced in 0.29.
